channel.title: Moparscape is Having Problems
channel.description: My server has been up 100% for like the past couple days, players on etc. Moparscape, however, has been telling me I'm having downtime. I went to check the status page just now and it told me I'm down, when I have me and two players on...help?

Zyle why didn’t you lock/move this topic?

Okay…It’s back to 99% now lol…stupid (yet highly loved by me) mopar…

item.title: Moparscape is Having Problems
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:451106”][quote author=Turmoilz1337x link=topic=553991.msg4058016#msg4058016 date=1343158406]
My server has been up 100% for like the past couple days, players on etc. Moparscape, however, has been telling me I’m having downtime. I went to check the status page just now and it told me I’m down, when I have me and two players on…help?
[/quote]

There are a few possibilities.

You have the wrong details in your status page.
Your firewall, or another force is preventing the update page to connect.
Your server is restarting at an interval that conflicts with the update page (extremely unlikely, but possible)[/quote]I don’t know it could be something with either the cron job updating for that ip specifically or it could even be the vps.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape is Having Problems
item.dc:creator: @Turmoilz1337x Turmoilz1337x
item.description:
@Turmoilz1337x wrote:

None of the above, I’ve checked, and it has been online on other pages when showing down here…

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape is Having Problems
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Turmoilz1337x:

My server has been up 100% for like the past couple days, players on etc. Moparscape, however, has been telling me I’m having downtime. I went to check the status page just now and it told me I’m down, when I have me and two players on…help?

There are a few possibilities.

You have the wrong details in your status page.
Your firewall, or another force is preventing the update page to connect.
Your server is restarting at an interval that conflicts with the update page (extremely unlikely, but possible)

Read full topic
